document_data.caption: ''The black dragon, Rogrotus.''
document_data.name: Rogrotus
document_data.mainbody: '''Rogrotus''' was a [[black dragon]] living near the [[Well of Dragons]].
document_data.History: When the [[Cult of the Dragon]] attempted to summon [[Tiamat]] into the world at the Well of Dragons, Rogrotus was one of the [[chromatic dragon]] heralds sent to ensure the coming of the Dragon Queen.
